arts.ttl: Real Madrid coach Xabi Alonso responds to Lamine Yamal’s controversial comments before El Clásico
arts.sum: He once again praised Kylian Mbappé and, when asked whether Madrid is playing good football, said, “Yes, I like what I see. But when asked if a player at “80 percent” fitness could still start, he was firm: “If someone is in the squad, it’s because they’re ready to play.”

arts.ttl: Which players have scored for both Real Madrid and Barcelona in El Clásico?
arts.sum: The first to do it, Josep Samitier (1902-1972), El Mago (the Wizard), remains a Barça legend, even though he enjoyed greater success in front of goal with Madrid in El Clásico . Some of them got on the scoresheet in El Clásico for either Madrid or Barça but only four players have scored in the iconic fixture for both.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso Addresses Vinicius Jr’s Reaction to Substitution in Real Madrid vs Barcelona
arts.sum: Vinicius Junior wasn't shy in displaying his emotions when he was withdrawn from Real Madrid vs Barcelona.

arts.ttl: ‘I like that’ – Real Madrid star defends Lamine Yamal after Barcelona controversy
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Aurélien Tchouaméni has moved to defend Barcelona youngster Lamine Yamal, amid the ongoing controversy surrounding the attacker. Lamine has taken his place centre stage in the post-match…

arts.ttl: One Real Madrid star played through sickness vs Barcelona
arts.sum: One Real Madrid star continued to showcase his complete and absolute commitment to the cause in the club’s latest outing. The player in question? Federico Valverde. This comes amid confirmation…

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham sends three-word message to Barcelona after fiery Clasico victory
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham scored the winner as Real Madrid beat Barcelona on Sunday but tempers flared in the Spanish capital with a late melee following a red card for the visitors

arts.ttl: Injured Barcelona star emerged from the stands to defend Lamine Yamal during Real Madrid chaos
arts.sum: Barcelona star Raphinha continued to showcase his leadership qualities during the club’s showdown with Real Madrid on Sunday. This came by way of his efforts to protect the under-fire Lamine…

arts.ttl: Marcus Sorg talks Yamal, Lewandowski, and post match clash after Real Madrid 2-1 Barcelona
arts.sum: Barcelona tasted their first defeat to Real Madrid in the Hansi Flick era, as they tasted a 2-1 loss to Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu. Interestingly, Hansi Flick was not available on the touchline for Barcelona as he was serving a suspension. In his stead, Marcus Sorg took charge, and despite his best efforts, the […] The post Marcus Sorg talks Yamal, Lewandowski, and post match clash after Real Madrid 2-1 Barcelona appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona's Marcus Rashford sends Man Utd message after El Clasico moment vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford has been in fine form for Barcelona, and his assist against Real Madrid in El Clasico on Sunday should serve as a stark message to Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim

arts.ttl: Torres 5.5, Szczesny 7.0 | Real Madrid 2-1 FC Barcelona: Player ratings
arts.sum: FC Barcelona lose to Real Madrid at the Santiago Bernabeu, and delivered a frustrating performance in the process. Not nearly as good as they needed to be, and Hansi Flick’s side deserved to lose this game. A 2-1 defeat sees Barça fall five points behind Los Blancos in terms of the La Liga table.
